dict.acceptation: 科学；技术，知识；学科；理科；

sent.orig: Science is asubject that is studied using scientific methods. Physics, biology and chemistry are all sciences.
sent.trans: science在这里是“科学课”的意思，物理、化学、生物等都属于科学课范围。

sent.orig: Energy science can be divided into hard energy science(HES) and soft energy science(SES) .
sent.trans: 能源科学可以划分为能源硬科学与能源软科学两大类。

sent.orig: Marketing is an applied which based on economy science, behavior science, management science and modern technology.
sent.trans: 市场营销学是一门建立在经济科学、行为科学、管理科学和现代科学技术基础之上的应用科学。

sent.orig: Computer Science, Early Childhood Studies, Geography, Psychology, Health Science Sports Science, Statistics & Genetics.
sent.trans: 计算机；儿童学；地理；心理学；健康科学；运动学；统计和遗传学。

sent.orig: Fields of science are distinguished as pure science or applied science.
sent.trans: 科学领域的杰出作为纯科学或应用科学。
